name: Fort San Pedro Dock
description: Learn for loops with range()! Repeat actions a specific number of times.
starter_code:
# Use a for loop to repeat actions
for i in range(5):
    # This runs 5 times (i = 0, 1, 2, 3, 4)
    pass
hints: Use car.move(1) to move forward one tile
The loop variable 'i' counts which iteration you're on
